title.rendered: This Week at Gottwals Books – July 3

content.rendered:
Holiday Hours

All of our locations will be closed on July 4th, but we will be open on Saturday for normal business hours! We hope you have a wonderfully relaxing Independence Day and find some time to READ!

Kid’s Corner: Teaching kids to love books!

Kid’s Corner will be held at the Warner Robins location next Wednesday, July 9 at 10:00 a.m. We will have snacks, drinks, drawings for a giveaway, and a very special guest reader…

Mayor Randy Toms!

Toy of the Week:

Picnic Basket Fill & Spill: $24.97

Here’s everything you’d see at a picnic (except the ants!). Remove and replace the four colorful picnic treats from a flip-top picnic basket. This soft play set features a wedge of watermelon, a bottled fruit drink, a take-apart sandwich, and an ice cream cone. Constructed of high-quality fabrics and plastic, this durable set will provide hours of pretend picnic fun!

excerpt.rendered: All of our locations will be closed on July 4th, but we will be open on Saturday for normal business hours! We hope you have a wonderfully relaxing Independence Day and find some time to READ!
